at.erp.light.view.controller.article

Class DistributionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.erp.light.view.controller.article.DistributionController

  • @RestController
public class DistributionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController.
    It manages calls concerning the article distribution for incoming and outgoing deliveries.
    Author:
    Matthias Schnöll

    • Method Detail

      • getArticlePUDistributionListByArticleId

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/articlePUDistribution/getListByArticleId/{articleId}")
public java.util.List<InOutArticlePUDTO> getArticlePUDistributionListByArticleId(@PathVariable
                                                                                       int articleId)
        Returns a list of objects representing the distribution for the given article Id.
        The list contains objects contianing the number of articles PUs for incomingArticles, outgoingArticles and the depot.
        Parameters:
        articleId -
        Returns:
        list with the distribution objects

      • updateArticlePUDistributionList

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/articlePUDistribution/updateDistributionList")
public ControllerMessage updateArticlePUDistributionList(@RequestBody
                                                               java.util.List<InOutArticlePUDTO> distributionList,
                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Updates the article distribution in the DB with the given distribution.
        Parameters:
        distributionList - new distribution for the article; the elements contain the Id of the incomingArticle, outgoingArticle or the depot and the number of PUs
        request -
        Returns:
        ControllerMessage showing the success of the call

      • deleteArticleAndDistribution

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/articlePUDistribution/deleteArticleById/{articleId}")
public ControllerMessage deleteArticleAndDistribution(@PathVariable
                                                            int articleId,
                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Deletes all incomingArticle, outoingArticle and depot entries with the given ArticleId.
        This function can be used to completely remove an Article from the DB.
        For example, if the article was not delivered by the deliverer.
        Parameters:
        articleId - of the Article which should be removed form all incomingArticles, outoingArticles and depot
        request -
        Returns:
        ControllerMessage showing the success of the call
